src:
BLACKPINK "DDU-DU DDU-DU" MV Has Surpassed 990M Views On Youtube!
01 Nov 2019, 10:53 by teaisgoodboi



BLACKPINK "DDU-DU DDU-DU" MV Has Surpassed 990M Views On Youtube!

BLACKPINKS MV"DDU-DU DDU-DU" has just hit 990 Million views on Youtube and counting.  This is a big moment in Kpop History as they will become the 1st kpop group ever to have a music video hit 1 Billion views and the 3rd girl group in the world to reach this milestone. GO STREAM BLINKS!!


Here Are Fans Reactions:



"1,000,000,000 BILLION VIEWSIS COMING!!"



-@queenllalisa



"legends coming for 1 billion"



-@PRXDYOONS



"1B is coming y’all. Stream dddd more and the rest of bp’s songs"



-@lorighyng



"Keep streaming, keep streaming!!!! Hahahaha. Congrats blinks and loves @ygofficialblink. We will get that 1B poster sooner so prepare Rosé's solo and your full album




#MAMAVOTE #blackpink"



-@loveforpinks


What do you think, Are you excited?
